name: bbPress – New UI
author: Daniel 4000

sections.description:
A great plugin that changes the interface of the forum: now he looks beautiful, fresh and in dark/light colors with plugin settings. The plugin integrated with plugin “bbPress admin replies”.

Languages:
English;
German;
Russian;
Brazilian Portuguese;
Polish;
French;
Danish;

If you want to add your language – just write me in admin@dk4000.com!

Features:

Reply Form Redesign (Screenshot 1)

Great choice between dark/light colors (Scheenshots 2,3)

Nice Admin Panel with some features (Scheenshot 4)

Closed and sticky themes are highlighted with a special icon (Screenshot 5)

New styles for categories: now they look just fine (Screenshot 6)

Many changes which improving the use of the forum.
sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Activate the plugin in Plugins page
  3. Enjoy your new style!
sections.faq:
How do I activate a new style?

Just activate the plugin. The styles will be activated automatically.

How can I change the style?

Find the tab “New bbPress UI” in the settings in the admin panel and select “switch color” or edit files in inc/css

How can I hide the copyright?

Find the tab “New bbPress UI” in the settings in the admin panel and select checkbox “hide”
